title: I'm going to invent something. How can I know that my ideas haven't been founded somewhere else? - Quora

response.answer_text: They have. But that is OK.  The universe has existed for 4 billion years before you, and there are 6 billion people living on this planet earth. Mostly any idea you can think of has been thought of. All these people, they have industry knowledge, they went to Harvard PhD programs and all kinds of degrees, and they live everywhere. No one has been sitting idle.  Build your idea, and your idea is yours. Otherwise your idea is just a picture of someone else’s belongings.  The key is to execute your idea. When you do, you will find it incredibly hard, but you will learn and you will advance. Focus, and execute.

There are Patent Attornies who do this for a living. A quick google search can tell you yes it has been done. That may save time and money. If that search turns up nothing, then hire an attorney. They are experts who can guide you through the entire patent process. Good luck.
